metadata.description: Superset configuration schema extracted from config_defaults.py

STATS_LOGGER.description: Statistics logger instance for metrics collection. Default: `DummyStatsLogger()`

EVENT_LOGGER.description: Event logger instance for audit trails. Default: `DBEventLogger()`

SUPERSET_LOG_VIEW.description: Enable access to log files through the UI. **Disable in production** for security.

SUPERSET_SECURITY_VIEW_MENU.description: Enable security view menu in the UI. Shows roles and permissions management.

BASE_DIR.description: Base directory path for Superset installation. Auto-detected from package location.

VERSION_INFO_FILE.description: Path to version information JSON file. Contains build metadata.

PACKAGE_JSON_FILE.description: Path to package.json file for frontend build information.

FAVICONS.description: List of favicon configurations. Each favicon should specify `href` (required) and optionally `sizes`, `type`, and `rel` properties.

ALEMBIC_SKIP_LOG_CONFIG.description: Skip Alembic log configuration. Set to `True` if you configure logging elsewhere.

VERSION_STRING.description: Version string displayed in the UI. Auto-generated from `VERSION_INFO_FILE` or set manually.

VERSION_SHA_LENGTH.description: Length of git SHA displayed in version info. Default: 8 characters.

VERSION_SHA.description: Git SHA of current build. Auto-generated from `VERSION_INFO_FILE`.

BUILD_NUMBER.description: Build number displayed in About section. Set during CI/CD build process.

DEFAULT_VIZ_TYPE.description: Default visualization type in chart explorer. Options: `"table"`, `"bar"`, `"line"`, `"pie"`, etc.

ROW_LIMIT.description: Default maximum number of rows returned by chart queries. Prevents excessive data transfer and memory usage.

SAMPLES_ROW_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of rows for data sampling.

NATIVE_FILTER_DEFAULT_ROW_LIMIT.description: Default maximum number of rows returned by native filters for performance.

FILTER_SELECT_ROW_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of rows retrieved by filter dropdown auto-complete.

DEFAULT_TIME_FILTER.description: Default time filter for charts. Use `NO_TIME_RANGE` constant or specific time ranges.

SUPERSET_WEBSERVER_TIMEOUT.description: Request timeout in seconds for the Superset web server. Increase for slow-running queries.

SUPERSET_DASHBOARD_PERIODICAL_REFRESH_LI.description: Minimum interval (in seconds) between dashboard auto-refreshes. Set to `0` to disable limit.

SUPERSET_DASHBOARD_PERIODICAL_REFRESH_WA.description: Warning message displayed when dashboard refresh is rate-limited.

SUPERSET_DASHBOARD_POSITION_DATA_LIMIT.description: Maximum size (in bytes) of dashboard layout data. Prevents oversized layouts.

CUSTOM_SECURITY_MANAGER.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Custom security manager class. Override Flask-AppBuilder default security. Must inherit from `SupersetSecurityManager`.

SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Track object modifications. Keep `False` for better performance.

SECRET_KEY.description: Your application secret key. **Must be overridden** in production via `superset_config.py` or `SUPERSET_SECRET_KEY` environment variable. Use a **strong complex alphanumeric string**. Generate with: `openssl rand -base64 42`

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Database connection string. Examples: `postgresql://user:pass@localhost/superset`, `mysql://user:pass@localhost/superset`

SQLALCHEMY_ENGINE_OPTIONS.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Dictionary of engine options passed to SQLAlchemy. Use for database-specific settings like isolation level: `{"isolation_level": "READ COMMITTED"}`. We **recommend READ COMMITTED** for production.

SQLALCHEMY_CUSTOM_PASSWORD_STORE.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom password store function for database connections. Implement a function that takes a `sqlalchemy.engine.url` and returns a password. Example: `def lookup_password(url): return "secret"`

SQLALCHEMY_ENCRYPTED_FIELD_TYPE_ADAPTER.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom encrypted field type adapter for sensitive data. Uses app `SECRET_KEY` for encryption by default.

QUERY_SEARCH_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of queries returned in SQL Lab query search.

WTF_CSRF_ENABLED.description: **[CSRF protection and form handling](https://flask-wtf.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable CSRF protection for forms. **Recommended to keep `True`** in production for security.

WTF_CSRF_EXEMPT_LIST.description: **[CSRF protection and form handling](https://flask-wtf.readthedocs.io/)**: List of endpoints exempt from CSRF protection. Use with caution.

DEBUG.description: Enable Flask debug mode. **Never enable in production**. Use environment variable: `SUPERSET_DEBUG=True`

FLASK_USE_RELOAD.description: Enable Flask auto-reload on code changes. **Only for development**.

PROFILING.description: Enable Flask profiling. **Only for development**. Adds performance overhead.

SHOW_STACKTRACE.description: Show full stack traces in error pages. **Disable in production** for security.

ENABLE_PROXY_FIX.description: Enable proxy fix for applications behind reverse proxies. Required for proper URL generation.

PROXY_FIX_CONFIG.description: Configuration for proxy fix settings. Specifies which proxy headers to trust.

RATELIMIT_ENABLED.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable rate limiting to prevent DDOS attacks. Uses `RATELIMIT_STORAGE_URI` for storage backend. **Recommended for production**.

RATELIMIT_APPLICATION.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Global rate limit for the entire application. Format: `"50 per second"`, `"100 per minute"`, etc.

AUTH_RATE_LIMITED.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable rate limiting for authentication endpoints. Helps prevent brute force attacks.

AUTH_RATE_LIMIT.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Rate limit for authentication attempts. Format: `"5 per second"`, `"10 per minute"`, etc.

APP_NAME.description: Application name displayed in the UI header and browser title. Default: `"Superset"`

APP_ICON.description: Path to application logo/icon displayed in the UI. Default: `"/static/assets/images/superset-logo-horiz.png"`

LOGO_TARGET_PATH.description: URL or path where the logo click should redirect. Leave `None` to disable logo clicking.

LOGO_TOOLTIP.description: Tooltip text shown when hovering over the logo. Leave empty for no tooltip.

FAB_API_SWAGGER_UI.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable Swagger UI for API documentation. Accessible at `/swagger/v1`

AUTH_TYPE.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Authentication type. Options: `AUTH_DB`, `AUTH_OAUTH`, `AUTH_REMOTE_USER`, `AUTH_LDAP`.

BABEL_DEFAULT_LOCALE.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Default locale for internationalization. Set to language code like `"en"`, `"es"`, `"fr"`, etc.

BABEL_DEFAULT_FOLDER.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Directory containing translation files. Default: `"superset/translations"`

LANGUAGES.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Dictionary of supported languages. Keys are language codes, values are display names.

CURRENCIES.description: List of supported currency codes for financial data formatting.

SSH_TUNNEL_MANAGER_CLASS.description: SSH tunnel manager class for secure database connections through SSH.

SSH_TUNNEL_LOCAL_BIND_ADDRESS.description: Local bind address for SSH tunnels. Default: `"127.0.0.1"`

SSH_TUNNEL_TIMEOUT_SEC.description: Timeout in seconds for SSH tunnel connections.

SSH_TUNNEL_PACKET_TIMEOUT_SEC.description: Packet timeout in seconds for SSH tunnel data transfer.

CACHE_WARMUP_EXECUTORS.description: List of executor types for cache warmup. Options: `ExecutorType.SELENIUM`, `ExecutorType.OWNER`, etc.

THUMBNAIL_EXECUTORS.description: List of executor types for thumbnail generation.

THUMBNAIL_ERROR_CACHE_TTL.description: Cache timeout in seconds for thumbnail generation errors.

SCREENSHOT_LOCATE_WAIT.description: Wait time in seconds for elements to be located during screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_LOAD_WAIT.description: Wait time in seconds for page to load during screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_SELENIUM_RETRIES.description: Number of retries for Selenium screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_SELENIUM_HEADSTART.description: Head start time in seconds for Selenium screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_SELENIUM_ANIMATION_WAIT.description: Wait time in seconds for animations to complete during screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_REPLACE_UNEXPECTED_ERRORS.description: Whether to replace unexpected errors with generic messages in screenshots.

SCREENSHOT_WAIT_FOR_ERROR_MODAL_VISIBLE.description: Wait time in seconds for error modal to become visible.

SCREENSHOT_WAIT_FOR_ERROR_MODAL_INVISIBL.description: Wait time in seconds for error modal to become invisible.

SCREENSHOT_PLAYWRIGHT_WAIT_EVENT.description: Playwright wait event for page loading. Options: `"domcontentloaded"`, `"load"`, `"networkidle"`.

SCREENSHOT_PLAYWRIGHT_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT.description: Default timeout in seconds for Playwright operations.

UPLOAD_FOLDER.description: Directory for temporary file uploads. Should be writable by the Superset process.

UPLOAD_CHUNK_SIZE.description: Chunk size in bytes for file uploads. Affects memory usage during uploads.

CACHE_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT.description: Default cache timeout in seconds. Applies to all cache backends unless specifically overridden.

STORE_CACHE_KEYS_IN_METADATA_DB.description: Whether to store cache keys in the metadata database. Enables cache key tracking but may impact performance.

ENABLE_CORS.description: **[Cross-Origin Resource Sharing](https://flask-cors.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing. Set to `True` if your frontend is served from a different domain. Requires: `pip install flask-cors`

HTML_SANITIZATION.description: Enable HTML sanitization for user inputs. **Keep enabled** for security.

SUPERSET_WEBSERVER_DOMAINS.description: List of allowed domains for the webserver. Used for security validation.

EXCEL_EXTENSIONS.description: Set of allowed Excel file extensions for uploads.

CSV_EXTENSIONS.description: Set of allowed CSV file extensions for uploads.

COLUMNAR_EXTENSIONS.description: Set of allowed columnar file extensions (Parquet, etc.) for uploads.

ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS.description: Combined set of all allowed file extensions for uploads.

CSV_EXPORT.description: Configuration for CSV export functionality including encoding settings.

DEFAULT_MODULE_DS_MAP.description: Default module-to-datasource mapping for backwards compatibility.

SQLLAB_SAVE_WARNING_MESSAGE.description: Warning message shown when saving queries in SQL Lab.

SQLLAB_SCHEDULE_WARNING_MESSAGE.description: Warning message shown when scheduling queries in SQL Lab.

CELERY_BEAT_SCHEDULER_EXPIRES.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Expiration time for scheduled tasks. Used for alerts & reports scheduler timing.

SQLLAB_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds for synchronous SQL Lab queries.

SQLLAB_VALIDATION_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds for SQL validation in SQL Lab.

SQLLAB_DEFAULT_DBID.description: Default database ID for SQL Lab.

SQLLAB_ASYNC_TIME_LIMIT_SEC.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Maximum duration (in seconds) a SQL query can run before being killed by Celery worker.

SQLLAB_QUERY_COST_ESTIMATE_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds for query cost estimation.

SQLLAB_CTAS_NO_LIMIT.description: Disable row limit for CREATE TABLE AS SELECT operations in SQL Lab.

RESULTS_BACKEND_USE_MSGPACK.description: Use MessagePack for results backend serialization.

FLASK_APP_MUTATOR.description: Callable function to mutate Flask app at startup. Receives Flask app instance as parameter.

SILENCE_FAB.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Whether to bump logging level to ERROR on flask_appbuilder package. Set to `False` for debugging AppBuilder issues.

DB_CONNECTION_MUTATOR.description: Function to mutate database connection parameters. Useful for dynamic authentication.

MACHINE_AUTH_PROVIDER_CLASS.description: Machine authentication provider class for programmatic access.

ALERT_REPORTS_WORKING_TIME_OUT_KILL.description: Kill alerts/reports that exceed working timeout.

ALERT_REPORTS_WORKING_TIME_OUT_LAG.description: Lag time in seconds before killing long-running alerts/reports.

ALERT_REPORTS_WORKING_SOFT_TIME_OUT_LAG.description: Soft timeout lag in seconds for alerts/reports.

ALERT_REPORTS_NOTIFICATION_DRY_RUN.description: Dry run mode for alert/report notifications. Useful for testing.

ALERT_REPORTS_QUERY_EXECUTION_MAX_TRIES.description: Maximum number of tries for alert/report query execution.

WEBDRIVER_BASEURL.description: Base URL for webdriver operations. Used for screenshot and export functionality.

WEBDRIVER_BASEURL_USER_FRIENDLY.description: User-friendly base URL for webdriver operations.

PREVENT_UNSAFE_DEFAULT_URLS_ON_DATASET.description: Prevent potentially unsafe default URLs on datasets. **Security feature**.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_REDIS_STREAM_PREFIX.description: Redis stream prefix for global async queries.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_REDIS_STREAM_LIMIT.description: Redis stream limit for global async queries.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_REDIS_STREAM_LIMIT_.description: Redis stream limit for global async queries firehose.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_COOKIE_NAME.description: JWT cookie name for global async queries.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_COOKIE_SECURE.description: Secure flag for global async queries JWT cookie.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_COOKIE_DOMAIN.description: Domain for global async queries JWT cookie.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_SECRET.description: JWT secret for global async queries.

GUEST_ROLE_NAME.description: Name of the guest role for anonymous access.

GUEST_TOKEN_JWT_SECRET.description: JWT secret for guest token generation.

GUEST_TOKEN_JWT_ALGO.description: JWT algorithm for guest token generation.

GUEST_TOKEN_HEADER_NAME.description: Header name for guest token authentication.

GUEST_TOKEN_JWT_EXP_SECONDS.description: Expiration time in seconds for guest tokens.

STATS_LOGGER.description: Statistics logger instance for metrics collection. Default: `DummyStatsLogger()`

EVENT_LOGGER.description: Event logger instance for audit trails. Default: `DBEventLogger()`

SUPERSET_LOG_VIEW.description: Enable access to log files through the UI. **Disable in production** for security.

ALEMBIC_SKIP_LOG_CONFIG.description: Skip Alembic log configuration. Set to `True` if you configure logging elsewhere.

DEBUG.description: Enable Flask debug mode. **Never enable in production**. Use environment variable: `SUPERSET_DEBUG=True`

LOGO_TARGET_PATH.description: URL or path where the logo click should redirect. Leave `None` to disable logo clicking.

LOGO_TOOLTIP.description: Tooltip text shown when hovering over the logo. Leave empty for no tooltip.

SUPERSET_SECURITY_VIEW_MENU.description: Enable security view menu in the UI. Shows roles and permissions management.

CUSTOM_SECURITY_MANAGER.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Custom security manager class. Override Flask-AppBuilder default security. Must inherit from `SupersetSecurityManager`.

AUTH_TYPE.description: **[Authentication, authorization, and admin interface](https://flask-appbuilder.readthedocs.io/)**: Authentication type. Options: `AUTH_DB`, `AUTH_OAUTH`, `AUTH_REMOTE_USER`, `AUTH_LDAP`.

MACHINE_AUTH_PROVIDER_CLASS.description: Machine authentication provider class for programmatic access.

BASE_DIR.description: Base directory path for Superset installation. Auto-detected from package location.

VERSION_INFO_FILE.description: Path to version information JSON file. Contains build metadata.

PACKAGE_JSON_FILE.description: Path to package.json file for frontend build information.

FAVICONS.description: List of favicon configurations. Each favicon should specify `href` (required) and optionally `sizes`, `type`, and `rel` properties.

VERSION_STRING.description: Version string displayed in the UI. Auto-generated from `VERSION_INFO_FILE` or set manually.

VERSION_SHA_LENGTH.description: Length of git SHA displayed in version info. Default: 8 characters.

VERSION_SHA.description: Git SHA of current build. Auto-generated from `VERSION_INFO_FILE`.

DEFAULT_VIZ_TYPE.description: Default visualization type in chart explorer. Options: `"table"`, `"bar"`, `"line"`, `"pie"`, etc.

DEFAULT_TIME_FILTER.description: Default time filter for charts. Use `NO_TIME_RANGE` constant or specific time ranges.

SUPERSET_DASHBOARD_PERIODICAL_REFRESH_WA.description: Warning message displayed when dashboard refresh is rate-limited.

SECRET_KEY.description: Your application secret key. **Must be overridden** in production via `superset_config.py` or `SUPERSET_SECRET_KEY` environment variable. Use a **strong complex alphanumeric string**. Generate with: `openssl rand -base64 42`

WTF_CSRF_EXEMPT_LIST.description: **[CSRF protection and form handling](https://flask-wtf.readthedocs.io/)**: List of endpoints exempt from CSRF protection. Use with caution.

FLASK_USE_RELOAD.description: Enable Flask auto-reload on code changes. **Only for development**.

PROFILING.description: Enable Flask profiling. **Only for development**. Adds performance overhead.

SHOW_STACKTRACE.description: Show full stack traces in error pages. **Disable in production** for security.

PROXY_FIX_CONFIG.description: Configuration for proxy fix settings. Specifies which proxy headers to trust.

APP_NAME.description: Application name displayed in the UI header and browser title. Default: `"Superset"`

APP_ICON.description: Path to application logo/icon displayed in the UI. Default: `"/static/assets/images/superset-logo-horiz.png"`

BABEL_DEFAULT_LOCALE.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Default locale for internationalization. Set to language code like `"en"`, `"es"`, `"fr"`, etc.

BABEL_DEFAULT_FOLDER.description: **[Internationalization and localization](https://flask-babel.tkte.ch/)**: Directory containing translation files. Default: `"superset/translations"`

SSH_TUNNEL_LOCAL_BIND_ADDRESS.description: Local bind address for SSH tunnels. Default: `"127.0.0.1"`

SCREENSHOT_LOAD_WAIT.description: Wait time in seconds for page to load during screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_SELENIUM_RETRIES.description: Number of retries for Selenium screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_SELENIUM_HEADSTART.description: Head start time in seconds for Selenium screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_SELENIUM_ANIMATION_WAIT.description: Wait time in seconds for animations to complete during screenshot capture.

SCREENSHOT_REPLACE_UNEXPECTED_ERRORS.description: Whether to replace unexpected errors with generic messages in screenshots.

SCREENSHOT_WAIT_FOR_ERROR_MODAL_VISIBLE.description: Wait time in seconds for error modal to become visible.

SCREENSHOT_WAIT_FOR_ERROR_MODAL_INVISIBL.description: Wait time in seconds for error modal to become invisible.

SUPERSET_WEBSERVER_DOMAINS.description: List of allowed domains for the webserver. Used for security validation.

EXCEL_EXTENSIONS.description: Set of allowed Excel file extensions for uploads.

CSV_EXTENSIONS.description: Set of allowed CSV file extensions for uploads.

COLUMNAR_EXTENSIONS.description: Set of allowed columnar file extensions (Parquet, etc.) for uploads.

SUPERSET_WEBSERVER_TIMEOUT.description: Request timeout in seconds for the Superset web server. Increase for slow-running queries.

RATELIMIT_APPLICATION.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Global rate limit for the entire application. Format: `"50 per second"`, `"100 per minute"`, etc.

AUTH_RATE_LIMITED.description: **[Rate limiting and DDOS protection](https://flask-limiter.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable rate limiting for authentication endpoints. Helps prevent brute force attacks.

SSH_TUNNEL_PACKET_TIMEOUT_SEC.description: Packet timeout in seconds for SSH tunnel data transfer.

THUMBNAIL_ERROR_CACHE_TTL.description: Cache timeout in seconds for thumbnail generation errors.

SCREENSHOT_PLAYWRIGHT_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT.description: Default timeout in seconds for Playwright operations.

CACHE_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT.description: Default cache timeout in seconds. Applies to all cache backends unless specifically overridden.

STORE_CACHE_KEYS_IN_METADATA_DB.description: Whether to store cache keys in the metadata database. Enables cache key tracking but may impact performance.

SQLLAB_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds for synchronous SQL Lab queries.

SQLLAB_VALIDATION_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds for SQL validation in SQL Lab.

SQLLAB_ASYNC_TIME_LIMIT_SEC.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Maximum duration (in seconds) a SQL query can run before being killed by Celery worker.

SQLLAB_QUERY_COST_ESTIMATE_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds for query cost estimation.

SQLLAB_CTAS_NO_LIMIT.description: Disable row limit for CREATE TABLE AS SELECT operations in SQL Lab.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_REDIS_STREAM_LIMIT.description: Redis stream limit for global async queries.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_REDIS_STREAM_LIMIT_.description: Redis stream limit for global async queries firehose.

SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Track object modifications. Keep `False` for better performance.

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Database connection string. Examples: `postgresql://user:pass@localhost/superset`, `mysql://user:pass@localhost/superset`

SQLALCHEMY_ENGINE_OPTIONS.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Dictionary of engine options passed to SQLAlchemy. Use for database-specific settings like isolation level: `{"isolation_level": "READ COMMITTED"}`. We **recommend READ COMMITTED** for production.

SQLALCHEMY_CUSTOM_PASSWORD_STORE.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom password store function for database connections. Implement a function that takes a `sqlalchemy.engine.url` and returns a password. Example: `def lookup_password(url): return "secret"`

SQLALCHEMY_ENCRYPTED_FIELD_TYPE_ADAPTER.description: **[Database ORM and connection management](https://flask-sqlalchemy.palletsprojects.com/)**: Custom encrypted field type adapter for sensitive data. Uses app `SECRET_KEY` for encryption by default.

SQLLAB_SAVE_WARNING_MESSAGE.description: Warning message shown when saving queries in SQL Lab.

SQLLAB_SCHEDULE_WARNING_MESSAGE.description: Warning message shown when scheduling queries in SQL Lab.

SQLLAB_DEFAULT_DBID.description: Default database ID for SQL Lab.

DB_CONNECTION_MUTATOR.description: Function to mutate database connection parameters. Useful for dynamic authentication.

ALERT_REPORTS_QUERY_EXECUTION_MAX_TRIES.description: Maximum number of tries for alert/report query execution.

WTF_CSRF_ENABLED.description: **[CSRF protection and form handling](https://flask-wtf.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable CSRF protection for forms. **Recommended to keep `True`** in production for security.

ENABLE_PROXY_FIX.description: Enable proxy fix for applications behind reverse proxies. Required for proper URL generation.

ENABLE_CORS.description: **[Cross-Origin Resource Sharing](https://flask-cors.readthedocs.io/)**: Enable Cross-Origin Resource Sharing. Set to `True` if your frontend is served from a different domain. Requires: `pip install flask-cors`

CELERY_BEAT_SCHEDULER_EXPIRES.description: **[Distributed task queue for async processing](https://docs.celeryq.dev/)**: Expiration time for scheduled tasks. Used for alerts & reports scheduler timing.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_REDIS_STREAM_PREFIX.description: Redis stream prefix for global async queries.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_COOKIE_NAME.description: JWT cookie name for global async queries.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_COOKIE_SECURE.description: Secure flag for global async queries JWT cookie.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_COOKIE_DOMAIN.description: Domain for global async queries JWT cookie.

GLOBAL_ASYNC_QUERIES_JWT_SECRET.description: JWT secret for global async queries.
